page.title: 03Education
page.content: In our area there are three schools, two primary, one comprhensive and also one technical college. Children start school at four and a half years old and stay at primary school until they are eleven and then go to comprehensive school until they are sixteen at least. School starts at approximately 9.00am and finishes between 3.00 and 4.00pm. We also have breaks in between. Clarendon Comprehensive School has 12 classes of children going there every year. Each class of children comes from a different primary school. We take lots of lessons such as Maths, English, Art, Science, P.E. etc. Children at school either stay for school dinners, go home for dinner or take a packed lunch to school.
